biocontainers.name: fsa
biocontainers.summary: Fast statistical alignment of protein, rna or dna sequences

biotools.summary: FSA (Fast Statistical Alignment) is a probabilistic multiple sequence alignment algorithm which uses a "distance-based" approach to aligning homologous protein, RNA or DNA sequence. FSA brings the high accuracies previously available only for small-scale analyses of proteins or RNAs to large-scale problems such as aligning thousands of sequences or megabase-long sequences.

bioschemas.name: FSA
